attributes.action: To stop the mps spending our hard earned money on them selves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we work hard to keep our money and to pay for things why do the mps get so much of our taxes pays money. there should have to save up like the rest of this country. no wonder our taxes are sky high. and our services are rubbish. Stop spending our money on rubbish like the mps home or 2nd home. and start spending it on the important things like the people who pay their taxes. we don't pay taxes for mps to spend it on their house. No wonder we have to keep getting donations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
